patch:
@@ -145,7 +145,7 @@
     <it.failIfNoSpecifiedTests>false</it.failIfNoSpecifiedTests>
     <surefire.failIfNoSpecifiedTests>false</surefire.failIfNoSpecifiedTests>
     <!-- Empty argument when code coverage is deactivated -->
-    <jacocoArgLine></jacocoArgLine>
+    <jacocoArgLine/>
 
     <!-- Set default encoding so multi-byte tests work correctly on the Mac -->
     <project.build.sourceEncoding>UTF-8</project.build.sourceEncoding>
@@ -223,7 +223,7 @@
                     </goals>
                   </pluginExecutionFilter>
                   <action>
-                    <ignore />
+                    <ignore/>
                   </action>
                 </pluginExecution>
               </pluginExecutions>
@@ -474,13 +474,13 @@
                    hbaseMajor == 2 && (
                      ("${hbase.compat.version}".equals("2.1.6")
                        && hbaseMinor == 1
-                       && hbasePatch >=6)
+                       && hbasePatch >=6)
                      || ("${hbase.compat.version}".equals("2.2.1")
                        && hbaseMinor == 2
-                       && hbasePatch >=1)
+                       && hbasePatch >=1)
                      || ("${hbase.compat.version}".equals("2.3.0")
                        && hbaseMinor == 3
-                       && hbasePatch >=0)
+                       && hbasePatch >=0)
                    )
                    </condition>
                   </evaluateBeanshell>
@@ -1506,7 +1506,7 @@
       <properties>
         <hbase.profile>2.1</hbase.profile>
         <hbase.compat.version>2.1.6</hbase.compat.version>
-        <hbase.version>2.1.10</hbase.version>
+        <hbase.version>2.4.0</hbase.version>
       </properties>
     </profile>
     <profile>
@@ -1521,7 +1521,7 @@
       <properties>
         <hbase.profile>2.1</hbase.profile>
         <hbase.compat.version>2.1.6</hbase.compat.version>
-        <hbase.version>2.1.9</hbase.version>
+        <hbase.version>2.4.0</hbase.version>
       </properties>
     </profile>
     <profile>
@@ -1536,7 +1536,7 @@
       <properties>
         <hbase.profile>2.2</hbase.profile>
         <hbase.compat.version>2.2.1</hbase.compat.version>
-        <hbase.version>2.2.6</hbase.version>
+        <hbase.version>2.4.0</hbase.version>
         <!-- PHOENIX-6010 3.1.3 doesn't work because of Guava rebase -->
         <hadoop.version>3.1.2</hadoop.version>
       </properties>
@@ -1553,7 +1553,7 @@
       <properties>
         <hbase.profile>2.3</hbase.profile>
         <hbase.compat.version>2.3.0</hbase.compat.version>
-        <hbase.version>2.3.3</hbase.version>
+        <hbase.version>2.4.0</hbase.version>
         <!-- PHOENIX-6010 3.1.3 doesn't work because of Guava rebase -->
         <hadoop.version>3.1.2</hadoop.version>
         <hbase.thirdparty.version>3.3.0</hbase.thirdparty.version>
